programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep142
programme.desc: Daddy Gets Fit - Peppa instructs Daddy Pig to do lots of exercise to do as he is a bit fat. Daddy Pig is horrified to learn you have to exercise every day to get fit.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep137
programme.desc: The Mystery Present - Bubu, Froga and Anna are looking for Anna's Ukulele, a bouncy ball and another item belonging to Froga. When searching, they find a beautiful present. Why is it here? Who is it for? What's inside? Our friends are planning to find out!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep138
programme.desc: The Friendship Bouquet - Froga is devastated because her sunflowers have withered in her garden and she cannot make her annual sunflower bouquet. Luckily, Anna, with her friends, searches for a solution to replace Froga's cherished sunflowers with something better!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Apple Pie / Guacamole - Tiny Chef bakes apple pie for the big contest, and after an accident, has to think fast to come up with a new entry. // Tiny Chef makes guacamole and has to learn to share when his friends want to help using a new kitchen tool.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep710
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Bad Bird Crew / Pups Save a Soapbox Derby - Myrna the Mynah bird leads her feathered friends astray and it's up to the Paw Patrol to rescue the wayward flock. // Adventure Bay is holding a kids only soapbox derby race when a mysterious newcomer named ''Hum-Kid'' shows up and breaks the rules!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep808
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treetop Trekkers - Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep106
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel - The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep302
programme.desc: The Space Station Mystery / Crystal Cracks - Strange things begin happening on board the space station. Deer Squad investigates and discovers there is a prankster on board - Trickalien! // Jade discovers a Time Crystal and she is forced to learn how to use it to turn back time!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant / Paddington and the Accidental Hero - Windsor Gardens has two new heroes - Mr Brilliant and Rare Bear, but will Jonathan and Judy be impressed? // Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome, but was the rescue as heroic as the stories he tells?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a City Kitty - Cali gets lost in the woods.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep711
programme.desc: Pups Save the Skydivers / Pups Save the Cupcakes - Mayor Goodway and Farmer Al are ready for a day filled with Skydiving fun, but their adventure is quickly derailed. It's Paw Patrol to the rescue! // Alex and the Mini Patrol get locked inside the flounder, the Paw Patrol dives in to save the day!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep107
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! When the pups find out a beaver is to blame, they've got to build him a new home to bring the power back. // When Speed Meister damages the road ahead of the town helper parade, the pups work fast to repave the way.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep146
programme.desc: At the Beach - Peppa and her family go to the beach, and they do lots of things there including burying Daddy Pig in the sand. When it's time to go they almost leave without Daddy Pig as he has fallen asleep.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep148
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Boat - Peppa and George go for a ride in Grandpa Pig's boat. Danny Dog and Granddad Dog are also out sailing. Grandpa Pig and Granddad Dog race their boats to see which is fastest.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep149
programme.desc: Shopping - Peppa and her family go to the grocery store for some tomatoes, spaghetti, onions and fruit, but Daddy Pig gets some chocolate cake for the kids.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep150
programme.desc: My Birthday Party - It is Peppa's birthday, and Peppa has a party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep151
programme.desc: Daddy's Movie Camera - Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep321
programme.desc: Trip to the Moon - Peppa's family go to the museum's moon exhibition with George's friend Edmond Elephant. But Peppa thinks there are going to the real moon and is worried.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep226
programme.desc: The Eye Test - Pedro Pony wears glasses. Peppa thinks she might need glasses too, so Mummy Pig takes her to the optician. Peppa is a little disappointed to discover that she has perfect vision but that doesnt stop her wearing some rather fabulous sunglasses.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Tenderest Bond of All / The Orange Empire - While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese souffl. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep106
programme.desc: It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle - Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Arcade Adventure - Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle are at the arcade-and Sparkle's got her eye on an amazing glitter rocket! But, when she doesn't have enough tickets for the rocket, the friends must jump inside different video games and win enough tickets to collect the prize!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pickleworld! - It's Pickleworld! The coolest, most pickle-riffic theme park in ALL of Axle City. Too bad Pickle's family got lost on the way there! In their briniest adventure yet, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to rescue the family and bring them back to the park.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep713
programme.desc: Pups Save A Lost Gold Miner / Pups Save Uncle Otis From His Cabin - Uncle Otis takes a trip to a lost gold mine. After wandering off course, Ryder and the Pups must save him from the booby-trapped mine. // Uncle Otis's installs a Smart Home 3000, in his cabin, that ends up trapping Uncle Otis and Mr. Wingnut inside!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep714
programme.desc: Pups Save a Rocket Roller Skater / Pups Save Ryder's Surprise - A mix-up delivery leads to Ms. Marjorie and Danny speeding out of control in Adventure Bay. Now the Pups must rescue them. // Ryder's present ends up in the jungle and Carlos is trapped in a Jungle Gym. It's up to the Pups to save them.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Daddy Shack / Rocky-Bye - After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. // Hank struggles to overcome his fears without the help of his pet rock, Rocky.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Bad Hank - When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy just like Shadow.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Paddington's Race Against the Storm / Paddington's Super Snail - Judy finds her inner hero when a storm hits on a Rangers Camping trip, and they need to shelter from the weather // Paddington befriends a speedy snail, who is so fast she has a heroic future ahead, but why does she look so sad?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand / The Crew Builds A Wildlife Bridge - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove! // Why does Crunchy the beaver cross the road? Because Rubble & Crew build a bridge to help him get to the other side!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Library Tea Shop / The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Construction on the first Builder Cove library is abuzz with bees! This calls for an extra sweet constuction solution. / Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Super Slide Trophy - Blaze and Gasquatch compete to win the Super Slide Trophy! But when they run into problems along the way, Gasquatch knows just how to solve them... with mud!

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep303
programme.desc: Runaway Hamster Ball / The Perfectinator - Steel accidentally uses the growth ray on Stu and Safia's pet hamster, turning her into a giant stomping hamster! // Steel and Lady Fluffpot get involved in a tidying robot one-up-manship battle when Kai makes Botler the tidiest robot in the city.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Rainy Day Round-Up / Deep Goo Sea - When an underwater storm rains on Baby Shark and William's fun, they doubt whether they can have an adventure indoors. // William and Vola enter a Young Scientist Contest and their competitive spirit gets them into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep715
programme.desc: Pups Save the Marooned Mayors / Pups Save the Game Show - While out ice fishing in the North Country, Mayors Goodway and Humdinger, along with Chickaletta, get stuck in an ice crevasse. // The Wingnuts' farm plays host to a rootin' tootin Game Show hosted by Cowgirl Beryl!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Pups Save a School Bus - When all the tires on the Adventure Bay school bus blow out, Ryder volunteers to use the Paw Patroller as a substitute school bus.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep109
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Drive-In Movie Theater / The Crew Finds A Rainbow Treasure - Mix and Motor's favorite TV star has a new movie playing in Builder Cove, if the pups can build place to watch it! // When Grandpa tells the pups about a secret buried treasure, they find out the key to finding this treasure is construction teamwork!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep152
programme.desc: School Play - Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Polly's Holiday - Granny and Grandpas pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Windy Autumn Day - It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppas ball blows into the pond and Georges hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Mysteries - The family is watching Detective Potato on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Bubbles - Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Bedtime - Its nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but its been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep125
programme.desc: Barbabravo Is Not Feeling Well / Be Patient Barbabravo... - Following a misadventure, Barbabravo is unable to transform at all. The whole family unites to help him. // Barbabravo can't stay put and is unable to focus one an activity for very long. Barbalala offers to teach him control. Will she succeed?

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep317
programme.desc: Paddington and the Unlikely Hero / Paddington Needs a Hero - Who's the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens and why do they want to remain anonymous? // Paddington finds a four-legged hero when he gets stuck in an igloo at the winter festival.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Pups Save a Cloud Surfer - Daring Danny X's harness loosens while kite-surfing.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Pups Save Little Hairy / Pups Save a Krazy Klimber - Big Hairy's little brother falls into a hole and Tracker gets carried away by Big Hairy. It's time for a Jungle Rescue! // Daring Danny tries extreme rock climbing with Ace Sorenson. It's up to the Paw Patrol to save the duo.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep111
programme.desc: The Crew & Marshall Build A Fire Station - Rubble & Crew build Builder Cove's first ever Fire Station, complete with an inspection from Paw Patrol's Marshall! But when Speed Meister's sneaky sabotage traps Marshall's Fire Truck, the pups work together to put out a fire construction-style.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep105
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Car Wash / The Crew Plans Grandpa Day - Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Snowball Bonanza / The Present - Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Emily Elephant - There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep210
programme.desc: George's Friend - George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep211
programme.desc: The Boat Pond - Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebeccas paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep212
programme.desc: Mr Scarecrow - The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep213
programme.desc: The Time Capsule - Peppa and her school friends are making a time capsule. They each put one of their favourite things inside and bury it in the school garden. The children discover that their parents made a time capsule many years ago.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep214
programme.desc: Recycling - Peppa and George help Mummy Pig tidy up the breakfast things. Mummy Pig tells them that bottles go into a special green box to be recycled. Old newspapers go in a red box and tins go in a blue box. Peppa and George have fun filling the boxes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S03 Ep320
programme.desc: Talent Day - It is Talent Day at Peppa's daycare. Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep225
programme.desc: George Catches a Cold - Peppa and George love jumping in puddles, even when its raining but when George takes off his rain hat, he catches a cold. After a while George is feeling much better. Now hes more than happy to wear his rain hat, even when its not raining.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Wild West Heroes - Yeehaw! Blaze, AJ, and Starla are on their way to a Wild West Picnic! But when the Lunchbox Bandit steals everyone's lunchboxes, it's up to our Wild West Heroes to get them back!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep717
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Bubblemaker - Super Wheels to the rescue! When the Bubblemaker starts trapping everything in his trouble bubbles, Blaze and Sparkle have to become superheroes to save Axle City!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep719
programme.desc: Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck / Pups Save a Desert Flounder - Mayor Goodway dreams she's travelled to the mysterious Cluck Cluck Island-a very strange land where Chickaletta is royalty! // Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder, Travis and Cap'n Turbot wind up all the way out into the desert.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep721
programme.desc: Pups Save a Trash-Dinger / Pups Save the Royal Armor - Mayor Humdinger's trash-compacting truck is messing up the beach. It's up to Rocky's new Re-Use It Truck to help save a rescue! // Gift for the Princess been scattered all over town. It's up to Rocky's Re-Use It Truck to put her gifts back together!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish / Sleeping Like a Baby - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night - The Tentacools (Baby, William, and Vola) get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Perfect Dinner / The Kittens - Barbapapa and Barbamama go out to celebrate their birthdays. Barbabelle is in charge and gets overwhelmed. // Barbabelle watches Bali's kittens. She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S03 Ep318
programme.desc: Paddington's Favourite Hero / Paddington And The Skateboarder - Paddington struggles to choose a hero for a special photo wall in the park - maybe he needs to look closer to home. // Paddington becomes a heroic skateboarder, thanks to Mateo and a special mask - but how magical is the mask?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep120
programme.desc: The Crew and Chase Are On The Case - There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue...and build a brand new Science Center to help investigate.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S07 Ep718
programme.desc: Super Wheels vs. The Green Queen - The Green Queen is turning everything in Axle City... green! Luckily Blaze, Watts, and Darington can transform into superheroes! Can they stop The Green Queen before Axle City is one color forever?

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep305
programme.desc: The Crystal Of Strength / Clamity - Injured from training and eager to feel strong again, Rammy gets the squad to go in search of the legendary Crystal of Strength on Sparkle Island. // When Steel takes a pearl from a clam, it chases him through the city to try and get the pearl back.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep119
programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep726
programme.desc: Pups save Thundermouth / Pups Save a Class Pet - Shortly after listening to the story of Thundermouth, the pups are on a mission to save elephants spooked by a scary noise. // Mayor Goodway is left in charge of a class pet, but the hamster escapes! Now it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the pet.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Pups Save a Pony - Priscilla the pony gets the chance to help the Paw Patrol rescue their own vehicle after they help her out of a canyon.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dinosaur Museum / The Crew Builds a Wheelchair Ramp - After uncovering dinosaur bones, the pups decide to build a dinosaur museum! // When Omar the Mail Carrier breaks his foot, it's up to the pups to make sure he can still deliver the mail by building ramps all over town.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep215
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's Office - Peppa and George are visiting Daddy Pigs office today. Daddy Pig works with Mr Rabbit and Mrs Cat. Mr. Rabbits job is all about numbers, Mrs Cats job is all about drawing shapes on the computer, and Daddy Pigs job is complicated.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep206
programme.desc: The Traffic Jam - Granny and Grandpa Pig have invited Peppa and her family to lunch. On the way, Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig get caught in a very long traffic jam, so Grandpa Pig decides to bring the lunch to them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep207
programme.desc: Rock Pools - Granny and Grandpa Pig take Peppa and George to a beach with lots of rocks and little rock pools to explore. They all have fun with a little crab, a seashell and a fossil. Peppa rescues a little fish in her bucket and puts it back in the sea.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S02 Ep208
programme.desc: Teddy's Day Out - Peppa and her family are having a picnic. Mr Zebra the Postman and Zo Zebra are having a picnic too, so they decide to have one big picnic. When its home time, Peppa leaves her teddy behind.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep139
programme.desc: Leaf Portraits - When Ron discovers that some leaves resemble his friends, like clouds are making shapes in the sky. Anna, Froga and Christopher are amazed by his discoveries. The leaves are blown away, and the wind takes the "Leaf Portraits".

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep140
programme.desc: Hiccups - Froga gets a terrible hiccup, each of her friends come up with creative solutions to help her to get rid of it. No matter how hard they try, though, the hiccups put their patience and good humor to the test!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep107
programme.desc: Ants on a Log / Quesadillas - Tiny Chef makes Ants-on-a-Log for a picnic, but has to solve a mystery when the food starts to disappear! // Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favorite jar of salsa open no matter how hard he and his friends try!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art / Pups Save a Hot Potato - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes. // Farmer Al and Yumi find out their garden is full of holes and their one of a kind potato is missing. Now the pups must find the potato thief!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep809
programme.desc: Pups Save the Treasure Cruise - Mayor Humdinger tricks people to sail icy waters in search of an Antarctic treasure but they all need rescued when they get stranded on shore.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep110
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway - A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: Deer Squad S03 Ep304
programme.desc: The Secret Island / Astrobot - Lady Fluffpot visits a secret island with Steel to find a birthday present from her cousin Adventure Alex. // Muffin's plan to get Dinobot into trouble goes disastrously wrong when the pair get trapped with Lola in an out-of-control Space Shuttle.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep36
programme.desc: The Water Badge - The squirrels learn all about where water comes from.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep37
programme.desc: The Traffic Badge - Duggee and the squirrels begin a trip to the lake, but get stuck in a traffic jam!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep38
programme.desc: The Dressing Up Badge - Norrie suggest a dressing up party to celebrate Enid's birthday.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep39
programme.desc: Funky Fireflies, Selangor River, Malaysia - A trip to see fireflies becomes a rescue when Xuli and Glitch get stuck in a swamp.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep40
programme.desc: Pirate Peril, Jamaica - Xuli dives into action when Glitch's pirate game puts Lars in danger. Yo-ho Go Jetters go!

programme.title: Kit and Pup S1 Ep41
programme.desc: Sand - Kit and Pup are pirates on a sandy beach on the lookout for treasure. They search up and down the beach, but where will they find the buried treasure?

programme.title: Yakka Dee S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Yoyo - Dee encourages a friend to say 'yo-yo' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a stripy yo-yo, some spotty yo-yos, a flashy yo-yo and even a peepo yo-yo!

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep67
programme.desc: Tickly - The Teletubbies enjoy doing 'Round and Round the Garden', especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other. The Tiddlytubbies have tickly fun too.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Let's Do The Tubby - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing and "Do the Tubby!".

programme.title: Clangers S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Finders Keepers - When Tiny is bored and can't find anyone to play with, Major invents a new ball game.

programme.desc: I Can Save The Day - Zip thinks Phoebe could be a superhero, so they craft some awesome superhero cuffs.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep29
programme.desc: Float My Boat - A Blocker delivers a boat to Lake Street instead of the lake. Can Team Tinpo ship it back to where it belongs?

programme.desc: Giant Messy - Messy and friends go to the funfair. But when the shrinkasizer comes out, they end up in a giant mess with mini Mini!

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep52
programme.desc: Tick Tock Messy - Messy goes to OKIDO to play with Zim and Zam's new discovery, but will he and his friends get back from this adventure in time?

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Do Elephants Forget - After he forgets to do his chores and empty his lunchbox, Monty wonders if it's possible for someone to remember everything.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep5
programme.desc: It's time to find a butterfly - JoJo searches for a butterfly to complete her nature tick-book. She learns that all butterflies start life as furry little caterpillars.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S1 Ep6
programme.desc: It's time to bake - Gran Gran and JoJo are excited to bake a batch of Great Gran Gran's signature Saint Lucian banana bread, but there's a problem - they don't know how long to bake it for!

programme.desc: Scooter Stand Still - Scooter Boy gets his confidence knocked after a small accident, so Sarah & Duck help him to get it back.

programme.desc: Music Fixer - Sarah's Tuba is making some very peculiar sounds, so a trip to the Music Shop is in order.

programme.desc: Panicky Percy - Percy causes confusion for everyone and prompts delays, when he spends too much time panicking over nothing.

programme.desc: Heart of Gold - Toby's passengers can't stop making fun of him, that is until he discovers two villains trying to steal King Godred's crown.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep6

programme.desc: Big Net Rescue - Carrot is determined to save Supertato from Evil Pea's trap without help from Prickly Pear

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

You wont find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of todays world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: Big Story is a documentary film program on CGTN. It explores global events with in a variety of filmic styles and featuring original, in-depth, thought-provoking storytelling.

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. An international team of reporters will follow the guidance of Occam's Razor - the principle that the simplest explanation is the best one. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.title: AFL Premiership Season Ep25
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - For the second year, the AFL brings all teams and matches to South Australia for Gather Round. Fremantle take on Carlton in Round 4 at the Adelaide Oval.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep97
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea are back to bring you reports on the Pacific and up-to-date information from journalists with deep regional expertise. (Return)

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 35 - Costa visits an aquatic wonder; Clarence creates a potted bushfood pantry; Millie renovates her chook run; Jerry tours a sprawling country garden; plus we meet a professor fighting to conserve critically endangered plants.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The horrific events of October 7 and its aftermath have dramatically changed the lives of Palestinians and Israelis. With widespread loss of life and devastation, suspicion and revenge are boiling over and fear is everywhere.

programme.title: India Votes 2024 Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Go beyond the headlines to reveal the concerns of Indian voters as they participate in the elections of the world's largest democracy. Our reporters in India examine the influence of politics and unravel key figures involved.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep27

programme.title: Four Corners Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Inside Israel's war machine. John Lyons asks the tough questions; challenging some of Israel's most powerful political and military voices about the country's strategy and intentions. Is there any way out of this war?

programme.title: The World This Week Ep12
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Our Law Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The cadets struggle under the weight of their most challenging frontline experiences yet. Meanwhile, First Nations police officers and communities alike grapple with their own feelings about a recent police shooting.

programme.title: Australian Story - Call of Duty - Anjali Sharma Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - School striker Anjali Sharma sued the government at 16. Now she's taking her fight for an end to fossil fuels to federal parliament, and the powerbrokers are listening.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The final word on the day's top stories, with the latest news and updated information from Australia's most trusted source of independent news. Presented by Mariam Saab.

programme.title: National Press Club Address - Rosie Batty - 2015 Australian of the Year Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Rosie Batty addresses the Press Club on the topic "Ten years after the murder of my son, and amid a national domestic violence crisis, how do we maintain hope that violence against women can be stopped?".

programme.title: Landline Ep8
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - A tasty sampler of stories from the land - covering food, agriculture, crops, climate, business and innovation - as we meet the fascinating people who make our rural and regional communities unique. Presented by Pip Courtney.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep10

programme.title: Insiders Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - After the Easter break, David Speers returns with the show politicians rely on to find out what's going on. A panel of leading analysts and commentators discuss the latest political issues and the Cook By-Election campaign.

programme.title: Offsiders Ep9

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep6

programme.title: Offsiders Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Offsiders returns after the Easter break to unpack all the week's sporting news and highlights. Kelli Underwood and the panel discuss the latest AFL, NRL, Super Rugby, A-League and more.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Rachel Pupazzoni presents the week in business, finance and economic news including the latest trends on Australian and international markets, analysing what's going on in the local and global economy and how it affects you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - My Garden Pa - Daniela Orchids Ep27
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Meet a pollination scientist who's looking into how some of our smallest orchid species can tell us so much about the wider eco-system.

programme.title: ABC News Regional Ep10
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Take a closer look at what's making headlines in regional and rural Australia. ABC News reporters uncover the news and unique stories about what's really going on outside the big cities. Presented by Amy Culpitt.

programme.title: Landline Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep71
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Bridget Brennan, Tony Armstrong and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep71
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - When big stories break, turn to Gemma Veness in the morning to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep71
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia - Bee Hotels, Direct Sowing & Coastal Gardens Ep6
programme.desc: Sr. 32 - Clarence Slockee meets a team combining bush care and music, Sophie Thomson makes native bee hotels, Costa Georgiadis explores a wildflower meadow, and Guest Presenter Luke Mitchell has a lesson on wooden tool restoration.

programme.title: Muster Dogs Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - The puppies are now one year old and have all gathered with their owners to complete their final 12-month assessment. One pup shines brighter than the pack and is rightfully crowned Champion Muster Dog! (Final)

programme.title: Landline Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Hosted by award-winning journalist Pip Courtney, Landline is Australia's only national agricultural television program covering stories from Australia's rural and regional heartland.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep51
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Live from Parliament House in Canberra, Greg Jennett brings you everything you need to know about politics, national and global affairs today, speaking with the key decision makers and stakeholders on issues in the news.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep71
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: Grand Designs Australia - Carlton Ep3
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Architect Annalise and project manager Kim have a plan to turn their tiny 1850s Carlton terrace into a multi-storied modern home with a large garden and a triple car-stacker. Their secret - to dig down and build up and out.

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw Bitesize Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Chef Adam Liaw makes lemongrass pork belly rice, a simplified version of Vietnamese-style broken rice.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep99
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: 7.30 Ep53
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: ABC News Tonight Ep71
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - More news, more often - the home of breaking news and in-depth coverage of the issues that matter. The ABC's network of reporters cover important stories and bring you news and information you need. Presented by Yvonne Yong.

programme.title: The Business Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

programme.title: The World Ep57
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - There's never been a more important time to stay in touch with what's happening in our world. Now at the new earlier time of 9pm AEST, Beverley O'Connor presents the latest international news from correspondents and guests.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Sikhs, Spies and Murder - India Ep4
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - In Punjab, northern India, the Sikh separatist movement is fighting to create its own independent Khalistan nation. Separatist leaders have accused the Modi government of targeting Sikhs around the world including Australia.

programme.title: The Pacific Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - The Pacific region is rich with culture, people and stories. Johnson Raela and Alice Lolohea are back to bring you reports on the Pacific and up-to-date information from journalists with deep regional expertise. (Return)

programme.title: Back Roads - Braidwood, NSW Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 10 - Back Roads visits the heritage-listed NSW town of Braidwood. Heather discovers what inspires the town's many artists and how their creative spirit helps the community pull together in challenging times. (Midseason Final)

programme.title: 7.30 Ep53

programme.title: The Business Ep41
programme.desc: Sr. 2024 - Australia's leading daily business and finance show, bringing you up to date on market moves, economic trends and the forces affecting consumers, employees and business owners big and small. Presented by Kirsten Aiken.

They send their photos and videos, which are verified and contextualized by France 24 team of professional journalists in Paris.

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: Keep up with the latest news from all over the globe with Focus on France 24. Focus programme provides exclusive reports from Monday to Friday at 7.50 am Paris time. Find out what's going on in the world of economy, politics, culture, sport, medicine, ecology. Focus has it all covered for you.

programme.title: The News
programme.desc: Watch the latest international top stories, The News every 30 minutes with the emphasis on debate, dialogue, role of cultural differences, analytics of key events all over the world, comments, hot topics of the day, reports.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Blanchfield vs. Fiorot
programme.desc: Prelims - A flyweight title shot may be on the line at Atlantic Citys Boardwalk Hall on March 30 when New Jerseys own Erin Cold Blooded Blanchfield faces French sensation Manon Fiorot in the five-round main event of UFC Fight Night. With a combined UFC record of 12-0, Blanchfield and Fiorot have been on a tear at 125 pounds, and with one more win in AC, a crack at the crown is expected to be next. Plus, Westwood native Vicente Luque continues on his quest to rule the welterweights when he battles highlight reel king Joaquin Buckley in what promises to be a memorable co-main event
